import React from 'react'; import './IntroPage.css'; import useIntroPage from '../../hooks/useIntroPage'; const IntroPage = () => { const { roomID, setRoomID, error, setError, isLoading, userRooms, handleJoinRoom, handleCreateRoom, handleDeleteRoom } = useIntroPage(); return (

Welcome to ResearchConnect

Build interdisciplinary research teams and generate impactful project proposals with AI-powered collaboration.

Create a dedicated space for your research team

Join existing room

Enter the Room ID provided by your collaborator

{ setRoomID(e.target.value); setError(''); }} aria-label="Room ID" className="text-input" />
{error &&

{error}

}
{isLoading ? (

Loading your rooms...

) : userRooms.length > 0 && (

Your Recent Rooms

{userRooms.length > 3 && ( )}
{userRooms.slice(0, 3).map((room) => (
window.location.href = `/room/${room.RoomID}`}>

{room.name || `Room ${room.RoomID.slice(0, 6)}`}

{Object.keys(room.profiles || {}).length} members {room.lastActive || 'New'}
handleDeleteRoom(room.RoomID)}> üóëÔ∏è
))}
)}
); }; export default IntroPage;
